column5: We are heading up Friday and we are meeting for lunch in Sioux Narrows. I called Gills to pre-order some 3 to 4" minnows but he said they don't sort. Does anyone know where to get the med to larger minnows in that area? Part of the group is coming from Fort Frances and part from Baudette. So, really any place will work. thanks
Try Sioux Sport Shop (a/k/a Border Baits), Nestor Falls Bait, and Anglers Pro Shop. Phone numbers are included here:https://snnf.ca/stay/business-directory/#all
Thanks Sioux Sport shop it is. Will hopefully be finishing lunch at the Mineshaft and back on the road by this time Friday
